item.title: Test page
item.description: Year numbering system # I use the Holocene Era or Human Era numbering system. It adds exactly 10,000 years to the currently dominant AD/BC or CE/BCE numbering system. It is denoted HE/BHE and allows for all key dates in human history to be listed using a simle increasing date scale - while keeping the transition from the CE calendar easy: you just add the digit “1” before the current year.
